article_text:
Health Department seeks $150,000 grant from Blue Shield of California Foundation

Grant would help address gaps between mental health and physical care

Integrated care benefits overall community health, officials say

article_metadata.title: Merced County seeks improvements mental health, primary care | The Merced Sun-Star

og.description: In the age of health care reform, integrating resources, according to health officials, is key to improving the quality of care.
og.title: Merced County seeks improvements mental health, primary care
